aboutMe: I am Ash Ketchum, a Pokémon Trainer from the town of Pallet in the Kanto region. My dream since I was a young boy was to become a Pokémon Master and travel the world with my Pokémon by my side. I started my journey at the age of 10 and have been traveling from region to region ever since, always seeking to improve my skills as a trainer and catch new and exciting Pokémon. I am known for my determination and never-give-up attitude, and I always strive to be the best trainer I can be. With my trusty companion Pikachu by my side, I am on an ongoing quest to become a Pokémon Master and fulfill my childhood dream.

workExp.title: Champion
infoPoints: Champion during the Orange Islands arc in the original saga.
Besting Drake in battle was one of my best moments as a Trainer and cemented Pikachu's spot as his secret ace
